Text:
When I nodded off, that 
 louse slipped in line 
 before me and bought the 
 whole batch.
I lined up for three \n days and three nights to \n get a reservation!
Found you!
Is the stuff okay!? Oh \n thank goodness!
Are you trying to hoard \n it all for yourself!?
Of course. It's one of \n the few pleasures left \n to an old woman.
D-Don't look at me, I \n didn't have anything to \n do with it either.
Teehee, I sneak a bit in \n before my husband gets \n home.
I-I don't know anything \n about that, I just \n bought it from Vogo.

They only make 'em in 
 limited batches, it's 
 impossible to get a 
 reservation.
Give me that cake!
H-Hey, don't leave me \n alone with her!
But it's sooo good. You \n never forget that taste.
AAAH!
When I saw how desperate Raven was for \n that dessert, I realized that it was never safe \n to get between her and her appetite.
Course I'm sure. It's \n "Anti-Gravity Cake," the \n rarest cake in town!
As for Vogo turning over a new leaf, \n I could only hope his cake venture was \n the end of his scheming...
C-Cake!?

I've been looking 
 forward to this all day! 
 I can't wait, I'm going 
 to snack on a bit now.
The last drop is to a \n man...
Later!
S-Snack!? Are you sure \n it's safe to eat?
He's in Lei Colmosna \n too, but he's at the top \n of the tallest building.
R-Raven...
I wish I could \n shift gravity...
Finally!
I've got Vogo's \n delivery for you.
Thank you, dearie.
Uhh, hope you don't mind \n my asking, but have you \n had this stuff before?
Raven!
I won't let you get \n away this time!
Hoard it!? \n No, I'm just-
Phew, made it.
Even old ladies are \n hooked on it... \n I can't bear to watch.
S-So that's what Vogo \n was up to!
I had to get one through \n Vogo, paid a pretty \n penny for it.
I should head up that building.
Vogo, what are you \n doing?
Hey, Kat, mind helping \n me with a little \n something?
Depends on the \n "something."
It's so I can put the \n past behind me.
The past?
Times are changing, and \n I want to change too.
If I just do this one \n last thing, I can make a \n clean break of things.
I can't get out of this \n last job...
But once it's done, I'll \n be a new man!
Alright... Once this \n last job's done, you'll \n turn over a new leaf?
Yeah... I swear on the \n Sun family's honor.
So, I need you to carry \n some undisclosed \n packages for me.
Don't ask what's inside. \n There's a reason \n they're undisclosed.
I don't think I want to \n know anyway... So, where \n do I need to take them?
First, I need you to \n take some precautions \n when handling 'em.

The stuff inside's 
 fragile, so don't go 
 whipping it around with 
 your gravity power.
You should be able to \n jump a bit with it, \n though.
Got it, the stuff \n inside is delicate...
Maybe it'll help \n protect the contents \n if I lighten my body?
There are four \n drop-offs. The first...
Is to a man living on \n this island, in the \n building above us.

I've got all the 
 information about the 
 other points in these 
 letters.

Just open them one at a 
 time to make sure spies 
 don't get a hold of that 
 info.
Here are the packages. \n Thanks for the help.
Head to the Drop-Off
I'm getting close to the drop-off.
I think I can reach it from there.
Head to the Next Drop-Off
Delivery from Vogo.
What took so long? \n I hope it's okay.
Don't worry, I was very \n careful with it.
Have you ever \n tried this stuff?
N-No, I don't even \n know what it is.
Good... That's for the \n best. Once you try it, \n you can't go back.
I can't live without it.
Wh-What am I \n hauling for Vogo?
The sooner I can wash \n my hands of this job, \n the better.
Let's see... The next \n delivery's to a woman \n near the harbor.
Stop! I can't let \n you do this.
R-Raven, what's wrong?
Just drop the \n package and go.
Raven, wait, don't \n tell me you're hooked \n on this stuff too?
I'd do anything for it! \n Anything...
Raven's addicted...
But I can't face her \n without my powers. \n Hmm...
Wow, wouldja \n look at that?
What?
Time to go!
Phew, got away.
Poor Raven... I hope she \n can find a way to get \n over her addiction.
I'm here with a delivery \n from Vogo.
You're new, aren't you? \n Is the package safe?
Yeah, had a little \n trouble on the way, but \n it's fine.
Hand it over! Quick. We \n can't let anyone see us.
Ooh, I'm gonna have \n some sweet dreams \n tonight. Hahaha.
She's a little weird... \n I better move on.
Alright, next up is an \n old woman in...

The top of that 
 building, eh... I can't 
 shift gravity, but maybe 
 I can leap up there?
Time to run!
Flee from Raven
I should go there first.
Head to the Next Drop-Off
There, on top of that building!
I should be able to go that way.
Head to the Last Drop-Off
She's so persistent!
Avoid Raven's Attacks and \n Reach the Final Drop-Off
Raven: \n Stay still!
I don't even know what's in here!
Raven: \n You can't fool me!
If you keep this up, you'll ruin what's inside!
There's the drop-off on the top of that building!
Raven: \n Hold it right there!
Deliveries
Package Durability
Not this way...
Shoot! I messed it up.
I need to be careful hauling this...
This package can't handle many more shocks.
